title: Remove Project
anote: NOTE: The 'Remove Project' only removes it from the project dropdown. However, your project content will be available at following location.
selproj: Select a project to remove, from the dropdown
warnlbl: Warning!!! The project cannot be recovered if you use this option.
errTitle1: Select a project from the dropdown
errMsg1: Please select a project from the dropdown that you want to remove
errTitle2: Currently active project cannot be removed
errMsg2: Please select a project from the dropdown other than the currently active project
errTitle3: Project not available in the project dropdown
errMsg3: Please select a project that is also available in the project dropdown, using the 'Choose folder' button

help.title: Export Project
help.body:
Description
Removes the project from the dropdown.
